name: Litghtsaber
description:
Little PICO-8 game made for a few events.

Controls:
left shift: turn on/off litghtsaber
mouse moves the blade.
holding left mouse button moves the hilt instead.. or you can think of it like that

Forum post: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=30137

Feel free to submit a PR, comment, tinker :)
